export_format.description: Export produces a ZIP file containing XLS spreadsheets and TXT files for tabular PHI data, plus PDF files for documents (progress notes, letters, legal docs, procedure notes, statements). XLS files include a 'File' column with paths to associated PDF documents stored in patient-specific folders (e.g., CHART01/). CCD exports include HTML and XML files.

clinical.evidence: Allergy, Current Medication, Diagnosis Codes, CPT Codes, HCPC Codes, Prescriptions, Lab Results, Lab Test Result Values, Rad Results, Vitals, All Vitals, Past Medical Hist, Surgery, Family History, Social History, Health Maintenance, Vaccination, CCD, Procedure Orders, Consults, Enc Progress Notes, Procedure Notes

secure_messages.evidence: Section 22 'Messages' — exports all patient messages from Message Compose screen with fields: ID, Date, Subject, Notes, Sender

billing_financial.evidence: Sections 43-47: Billing Ledger, Billing Claims (very extensive field list including claim status, amounts, insurance sequences, modifiers), Billing Charges (detailed charge line items with paid/adjusted/writeoff amounts per payer), Patient Advance, Statements. Available when billing is enabled for the clinic.

insurance_coverage.evidence: Sections 1 and 9: Insurance Master (company details, payer IDs, filing indicators) and Patient Insurance (plan number, group info, copay, deductible, pre-auth numbers, eligibility data). Also Adjusters (section 4) with insurance adjuster details.

appointments_scheduling.evidence: Sections 23 and 42: Future Appointments (scheduled/tentative from today onward) and Past Appointments (all historical with multiple visit statuses). Fields include doctor, visit type, status, reason, location, times.

documents_images.evidence: Sections 18-21, 34-36: Legal Documents, Other Documents, Enc Attach Docs, Old Progress Notes, Procedure Notes, Letters. Documents exported as PDFs in patient-specific folders (e.g., CHART01/DOCLD_1974.pdf). HTML documents are converted to PDF.

audit_trails.evidence: Audit Trail section states 'Single Patient and Patient Population Data Export action can be tracked in Audit Trail Reports'. However, audit trail data itself does not appear to be included as a selectable export data element — it tracks the export action, not exported as data.

issues: The #ehiexport anchor in the registered URL does not correspond to any element ID in the page — the browser does not scroll to the EHI section automatically
Patient population export is NOT self-service — requires contacting Bizmatics support team (support@bizmaticsinc.com), which may not fully comply with b(10) self-service requirements
Documentation does not include data types for fields — only field name lists
No value sets or code enumerations provided
Audit trail section only mentions tracking export actions, not exporting audit trail data itself
PDF version dated 2023 (Denali 3.1) — may not reflect current product version
summary: Bizmatics provides a single 26-page PDF documenting 47 data element categories exportable from PrognoCIS. The export produces a ZIP containing XLS/TXT files for structured data and PDFs for documents, organized in patient-specific folders. Coverage is comprehensive: clinical data, messages, billing/claims (very detailed), insurance, appointments, and documents are all included with field-level listings. However, the documentation lacks data types, value sets, and schema definitions — it provides only field name lists in prose format. Patient population export requires vendor assistance rather than self-service.
